name: Slim Organic Margarita (La Flaca)
preparation:
Organic tequila makes this simple version of the classic Margarita extra-special.

If desired, coat the rim of a Martini or Margarita glass with salt and set aside.

Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into the prepared glass.

Garnish with a lime wheel.
